title: Bug 13189Refactoring  deleting fields  context menu is overriden by message dialog
description: 20020409I on LinuxMotif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2. Enable option 'Code GeneratorRemove prefix from field names'3. Open TestCase.java4. In the outliner, right click on 'fName'.5. Observe: No context menu is shown, instead, it asks me right awayif I want to delete the getter/setter as well.
